RumorFact.Text: Slate mentioned that Hornfels prepares new exhibits on the upper floor of the observatory, I should check out the new find Hornfels is working on.

ExploreFact.Text: Hornfels is preparing a new exhibit. It's a strange device that the Nomai found here on Timber Hearth. Hornfels suspects it predates the Nomai.
According to the exhibit information, Chert discovered this device on Ember Twin, I should speak to them to find out more.

Two Nomai, Zamoi and Nanouk were quite excited by their discovery. Nanouk spoke of a signal eminating from the device and wished to investigate further, however they were tied up working on the Ash Twin Project

RumorFact.Text: I detected a signal coming from the device the Nomai found, <color=orange>I wonder if the signal can be found anywhere else in the system?</color>

ExploreFact.Text: I tuned my signalscope to the frequency emitted by the device the Nomai found, and picked up a matching signal deep out in space
